execution_plan.description: Select inactive products from the main store database (products table where is_active is false).
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, name, sku, price, category_id, is_active, created_at FROM products WHERE is_active = false;

execution_plan.description: Select inactive items from the alternate store database (items table where active flag is not 'Y').
execution_plan.query: SELECT code, title, amount_in_cents, group_ref, active, created_on FROM items WHERE active <> 'Y';
